title: 2022 OPA Community Survey
intro: This page presents selected results from the 2022 OPA Community Survey for comparison across years. For the full survey results and detailed analysis, please see the blog post.

sections.title: General
sections.description: This section contains questions seen by all respondents and is intended to give a high level overview of how OPA is used.

sections.title: Demographics
sections.description: These questions are shown to all respondents and are intended to be used for comparisons with other questions and other survey years.
